line.text: If my dear love were but the child of state
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: It might for Fortune bastard be unfathered
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As subject to time love or to time hate
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Weeds among weeds or flowers with flowers gathered
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No it was builded far from accident
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: It suffers not in smiling pomp nor falls
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Under the blow of thralled discontent
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whereto th inviting time our fashion calls
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: It fears not policy that heretic
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which works on leases of short-numbered hours
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: But all alone stands hugely politic
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That it nor grows with heat nor drowns with showers
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To this I witness call the fools of time
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Which die for goodness who have lived for crime
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
